page.title: 11PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: {CATHOLIC CHURCH, HONITON Situated at west end of Honiton. There are about 200 parishioners, 150 of which attend worship. There is also a training college- St.Rita's which caters for young Catholics. {BUCKERELL CHURCH 14th century building. Has about 170 parishioners. Services usually once a fortnight. Remarkably well cared for. No longer has its own vicar- served by vicar from Feniton. {AWLISCOMBE CHURCH Mostly 14th century building. Vicar lives in village,part of group clergy Services each Sunday (5th Sun.Honiton) The 6 bells (oldest 1432)rung each Sun Average attendance 40, 150 'specials' {WESTON GOSPEL HALL On the Edward's family land, run by them.Services each Sunday emphasis on family worship.Lay preachers.Fri. Club
